## Goal (WHY)
Enable PLN to track HOW it reached a conclusion, not just WHAT it concluded.

## Interface Contract (WHAT)
```python
@dataclass
class InferenceStep:
    rule_applied: str           # e.g., "deduction", "abduction"
    premises: List[str]         # Input facts/rules used
    conclusion: str             # What was derived
    truth_value: TruthValue     # Confidence of this step
    
@dataclass
class ExplanationChain:
    steps: List[InferenceStep]  # Ordered inference steps
    final_conclusion: str
    overall_confidence: TruthValue
    
    def to_natural_language(self) -> str:
        '''Convert chain to human-readable explanation.'''
```

## Integration Points
- Extends: cortical/reasoning/prism_pln.py
- Used by: PLNReasoner.query() will return ExplanationChain
- Data structure only - no logic changes yet

## Test Requirements
Location: tests/unit/test_pln_explanation.py

```python
def test_explanation_chain_creation():
    step = InferenceStep(rule_applied="deduction", ...)
    chain = ExplanationChain(steps=[step], ...)
    assert len(chain.steps) == 1

def test_to_natural_language():
    chain = ExplanationChain(...)
    text = chain.to_natural_language()
    assert "because" in text.lower()
```

Verification: python -m pytest tests/unit/test_pln_explanation.py -v

## Anti-Patterns
- Do NOT change PLNReasoner.query() yet - just add data structure
- Do NOT put tests in wrong location
- Do NOT skip TDD - write tests first

## Freedom Zone
- Natural language format is up to you
- Internal helper methods as needed
- Field naming conventions

## Reference: docs/epic-cognitive-nlu-nlg-knowledge-base.md
